thread.title: LeAnn Rimes shares adorable throwback photo from her first cassette tape
thread.title_full: LeAnn Rimes shares adorable throwback photo from her first cassette tape - TODAY.com

author: Randee Dawn
title: LeAnn Rimes shares adorable throwback photo from her first cassette tape
text:
For most 34-year-olds, a 20-year-old photo is likely to show them playing with friends or acting in a school play.
Not so with LeAnn Rimes, who was already releasing music as a rock-solid pro!
My little 8 year old self. This was my first tape. #tbt #throwbackthursday #throwback #thathair #whereitallbegan
A photo posted by LeAnn Rimes Cibrian (@leannrimes) on Jan 26, 2017 at 10:47am PST
Of course, what that means is that there are official photos of the 8-year-old Rimes, all done up and ready to take on the world, and she shared one on Instagram on Thursday.
RELATED: LeAnn Rimes, TODAY Show team up for new 'TODAY Is Christmas' holiday song
In it, she's got the face of a child ... but the hair of a, let's say, older woman and is wearing a sweet red dress and earrings! It's from the cassette single cover of "From My Heart to Yours" from 1992, four years before she broke through big with "Blue."
More Music videos 2:52 Tamron Hall performs in ‚ÄòChicago‚Äô with Mel B: Wait till you see what she wore! 2:44 Gwen Stefani teams up with Celine Dion as she returns to ‚ÄòThe Voice‚Äô 0:32 Elton John to pen Broadway musical ‚ÄòThe Devil Wears Prada‚Äô 0:57 Taylor Swift and Zayn Malik team up: Get a first look making of the video But even she admits the coif is a little off, with the #thathair hashtag.
Eh, we all have those kind of pictures lying around somewhere. These days, Rimes is still recording (she released her latest album in 2016) and is married to actor Eddie Cibrian. And don't they look adorable together!
Supercross Lovers üèçüòç #supercross #lovers #saturdaynight #playtime @eddiecibrian
A photo posted by LeAnn Rimes Cibrian (@leannrimes) on Jan 21, 2017 at 6:02pm PST
RELATED: LeAnn Rimes seeks forgiveness for past cheating
Proof that hair errors are not forever!
